p: Morin, a bioflavonoid, has proven to be a cardio-protective agent via animal modeling. Rats were divided into groups, and morin was orally and dose dependently administered to the experimental group. Myocardial necrosis was induced, and the result suggested the improved antioxidant effects and apoptosis. The mechanism for this cardio protection was reported due to alteration of MAPK/NF-kappa B/TNF-alpha pathway ( Table 3) [ 132].
